dialogs.text: Hey there! How can I help you today?
I need to book a ride to the airport.
Sure! I can help with that. When is your flight, and where are you departing from?
Do you have any other options?
If you'd prefer, I can send you options for ride-share services instead. Would you like that?
No, I'll manage on my own.
No worries! Feel free to reach out anytime.
Alright, thanks anyway.
You're welcome! Have a fantastic trip!
